text: ineziyami bete’amiratachini yemiyaminuti (wede anite) bemet’u gize «selami be’inanite layi yihuni፡፡ getachihu benefisu layi izinetini ts’afe፡፡ ineho ke’inanite wisit’i besihiteti kifuni sira yesera sewi keziyami ke’irisu behwala yetets’ets’etena sirawini yasamere irisu (alahi) mehari azanyi newi» belachewi፡፡
